lead_paragraph: James S. Snyder, who has led the institution for 20 years, will shift to the role of international president next January.

headline.print_headline: Israel Museum’s Director to Make Way for Successor
headline.main: Israel Museum’s Director to Make Way for Successor

snippet: James S. Snyder, who has led the institution for 20 years, will shift to the role of international president next January.
abstract: James S Snyder, president of Israel Museum in Jerusalem, will become international president of museum's worldwide activities; search for his replacement has begun.
